code: import React from'react';import{AppBar,Toolbar,IconButton,Badge,Typography,Button}from'@material-ui/core';import ExitToAppIcon from'@material-ui/icons/ExitToApp';import{ShoppingCart}from'@material-ui/icons';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import useStyles from'./style';import logo from'../products/assets/logo.png';import{signOut}from"firebase/auth";import{auth}from"../../firebase";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Navbar=function Navbar(_ref){var totalitems=_ref.totalitems;var logoutUser=function logoutUser(){signOut(auth);window.location.href='/';};var classes=useStyles();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"fixed",className:classes.appbar,style:{backgroundColor:'#1B224A'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"commerce.js",height:"35px"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:Link,to:"/product",variant:"h6",className:classes.title,children:"E-CART"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.grow}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.button,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{component:Link,to:"/cart","aria-label":"Show cart items",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{badgeContent:totalitems,color:"secondary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShoppingCart,{style:{color:'white',cursor:'pointer'}})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExitToAppIcon,{onClick:logoutUser,style:{color:'white',padding:'1vh',cursor:'pointer'}})]})});};export default Navbar;
